field.name: s51spacer
field.label: Below you can choose whether or not show the content/component area on the frontpage. If you choose no you must have a module published to either above_body_5,6,7 or 8 or below_body_1,2,3 or 4 or the layout will not be correct. If you choose no and disable all modules published to the frontpage in the positions above_body_1,2,3,4,5,6,7 or 8, below_body_1,2,3,4,5,6,7 or 8 left and right then the entire middle section will collapse.
